Metadata: University of California Sea Grant Cooperative Extension, San Diego County

Tidelines will be published quarterly as a local newsletter dealing with practical problems in the areas of Commercial and sport fisheries; Seafood processing, aquaculture, marine education and youth programs, marine research, waterfront management, boating industry, marine transportation, environmental policy, and coastal engineering. Cover articles include: Low cost loans for fishboat fuel-saving gear; Do you Sea Debris?, California's southern coast now undergoing the first stages of lease sale 95, Vacuum packaged and frozen albacore tuna, Protect your boat from corrosion: preventing galvanic action, Assessing fishery economic impact.
